synopsis.text: This captivating anime delves into the lives of two high school friends, Yuma Okazaki and Hotaru Mizushina, who have been inseparable since childhood. When Yuma finds herself in the throes of a new relationship, she turns to Hotaru for guidance. The pair, along with their respective boyfriends, embark on a seemingly innocent group date, but the event takes an unexpected turn when Hotaru makes a bold move towards Yuma. In the privacy of a bathroom cubicle, Hotaru offers herself as 'practice' for Yuma's budding romance, leaving the latter both confused and intrigued. As the story unfolds, Yuma and Hotaru find themselves entangled in a web of emotions, grappling with their feelings for each other while maintaining the facade of their relationships with their boyfriends. The anime explores the complexities of love, friendship, and betrayal, as Yuma and Hotaru navigate their secret tryst amidst their seemingly perfect lives.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
